review: Did a bunch of research before buying this little gem and i am pleased to say it does what i want and thats just about everything.  It has netflix and prime which is nice but i also have 150 tv shows and 750 bluray movies in my collection which i have digitized onto several harddrives. This box wont stream those unless you tweak and side-load some apps which i did and it works beautifully.  An easy app to do this with is 'apps to firetv' on google play. This app makes side loading a breeze. I went with kodi (xbmc) with the eminence skin and loaded a bunch of addons that get me anything my heart desires. Even launches netflix from within kodi, still working on prime. Takes some work to get it where it needs to be but i enjoy a good project like this.
